articles.content: The liver is considered to be the chemical factory of the body that works around the clock. If you eat and drink right then nothing can disrupt its functioning and it will continue to work in a healt… [+2146 chars]

articles.title: Child victims of violence experience long-term psychological effects: Study - ANI News
articles.description: A study of young adults who had suffered violent injuries as children found that they had significantly higher levels of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) than the general population.
articles.content: Washington [US], April 20 (ANI): A study of young adults who had suffered violent injuries as children found that they had significantly higher levels of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) than th… [+4370 chars]
